title: Fakemas
description: Two old friends and a pretend holiday date that’s about to be so much more.JamieI’ve loved Libby for years, but she’s never seen me that way. But this holiday, all that changes. She told a little white lie about a boyfriend, and now, she needs me to play the role. Little does she know, I won’t give it up without a fight.LibbyJamie has always been the boy next door. No one can drive me crazy like he can, but then again, they do say there’s a thin line between love and hate. This holiday, I’m about to find out just how thin.Welcome to Briar Vale, a cozy small town full of OTT heroes and the feisty ladies who keep them on their toes. If you like charming settings , found family and steamy romance , with a sweet HEA guaranteed , you’ll love the Briar Vale series. This short, steamy and sweet series is the perfect length to read in one sitting. Take a coffee-break-sized trip and fall in love.
author: Gia Bailey
